SELECT t_da_supplier.city_id as cityId, t_da_province.province_id, supplier_id as supplierId, supplier_name as supplierName, t_da_supplier.created_by as createdBy, date_format(t_da_supplier.created_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as createdDate, t_da_supplier.lastupdated_by as lastupdatedBy, date_format(t_da_supplier.lastupdated_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as lastupdatedDate, t_da_supplier.active_flag as activeFlag, t_da_city.city_name as cityName, t_da_city.city_abbreviation as cityAbbreviation, t_da_province.province_name as provinceName, t_da_province.province_abbreviation as provinceAbbreviation FROM t_da_supplier LEFT JOIN t_da_city ON t_da_supplier.city_id = t_da_city.city_id LEFT JOIN t_da_province ON t_da_province.province_id = t_da_city.province_id WHERE supplier_id > 0
supplier_name like '%$param.supplierName$%'
$orderByStatement$
LIMIT $first$, $pageSize$;

SELECT count(*) as total FROM t_da_supplier LEFT JOIN t_da_city ON t_da_supplier.city_id = t_da_city.city_id LEFT JOIN t_da_province ON t_da_province.province_id = t_da_city.province_id WHERE supplier_id > 0
supplier_name = '%$param.supplierName$%'

SELECT * FROM t_da_supplier WHERE supplier_id > 0
supplier_name = '$supplierName$'
city_id = $cityId$
supplier_id != $supplierId$

SELECT T_DA_SUPPLIER.* FROM T_DA_CATEGORY, T_DA_PRODUCT, T_DA_PRODUCTBRAND, T_DA_BRAND, T_DA_SUPPLIERPRODUCT, T_DA_SUPPLIER WHERE T_DA_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID = T_DA_PRODUCT.CATEGORY_ID AND T_DA_PRODUCTBRAND.BRAND_ID = T_DA_BRAND.BRAND_ID AND T_DA_PRODUCTBRAND.PRODUCT_ID = T_DA_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID AND T_DA_PRODUCTBRAND.PRODUCTBRAND_ID = T_DA_SUPPLIERPRODUCT.PRODUCTBRAND_ID
T_DA_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID = $categoryId$
T_DA_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = $productId$
T_DA_BRAND.BRAND_ID = $brandId$
